content:
Hey, I just got a mir-opt testcase that failed during a master merge but didn't fail on the branch CI, which seems... weird especially since it wasn't involved in rollups and the test code hasn't been touched in two weeks.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74837#issuecomment-665687267

It seems like the expected result from InstrumentCoverage somehow is changing?
